helpers

Class BuildingSelectQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.BuildingSelectQuery

  • public class BuildingSelectQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Brian Olaogun Helper for the Student and Admin side of the website. This class contains majority of the methods for building related select queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildingSelectQuery()
      Connect to database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildingSelectQuery

        public BuildingSelectQuery()
        Connect to database. This is hard coded in DBConnect.java

    • Method Detail

      • doBuildingRead

        public void doBuildingRead()
        Query to get buildings with an online status for the current day and check to see if the building is open at the current time.

      • doAdminBuildingRead

        public void doAdminBuildingRead()
        This method returns all the currently online buildings

      • getBuildingResults

        public java.lang.String getBuildingResults()
        Results of doBuildingRead and doAdminBuildingRead
        Returns:
        a new String HTML drop down list with the selected value listed first

      • getBuildingResults

        public java.lang.String getBuildingResults(int selected)
        Results of doBuildingRead and doAdminBuildingRead
        Parameters:
        selected - value from the HTML building drop down list
        Returns:
        a new String HTML drop down list with the selected value listed first

      • buildingName

        public java.lang.String buildingName(int buildingID)
        This method takes into account the building schedule. If the building is not online, an empty string is returned. We get the building name from inputted buildingID
        Parameters:
        buildingID - ID of the building
        Returns:
        buildingName Name of the building

      • getAllActiveBuildings

        public java.lang.String getAllActiveBuildings()
        This method brings back all the active buildings for a pull down list

      • selectBuildingToViewRooms

        public java.lang.String selectBuildingToViewRooms()
        This method creates page for a person to select a building to view its rooms calls on getAllActiveBuildings above to list the select pull down of all active buildings
        Returns:
        pull-down form w/ all online buildings

      • getBuildingNameFromID

        public java.lang.String getBuildingNameFromID(int buildingID)
        This method takes just a building record id and returns the human readable name
        Parameters:
        buildingID - table record ID for the building in the building database table
        Returns:
        the building Name

      • getFirstBuildingID

        public int getFirstBuildingID()
        Return the building ID of the first value in the Building table. This is for admin functionality.
        Returns:
        first row's buildingID

      • buildingsOnline

        public boolean buildingsOnline()
        This method will check to see if a building is online or not. If any buildings are online, the returned value will be true. If NO BUILDINGS are online, it will return false.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • buildingScheduleCheck

        public java.lang.String buildingScheduleCheck(java.lang.String startDate,
                                              java.lang.String startTime,
                                              java.lang.String buildingID)
        This method will check to see if a building is open at the user specified time
        Parameters:
        startDate - String date in yyyy-MM-dd format
        startTime - String time in HH:mm:ss (24-hour) format
        buildingID - String buildingID
        Returns:
        String buildingID if the building is open at the date and time entered. If not open, and empty string is returned.

      • getBuildingStartTime

        public java.lang.String getBuildingStartTime(int buildingID,
                                             java.lang.String dateToSearch)
        Gets the start time for the building on the date and building id sent
        Parameters:
        buildingID, - date to check
        dateToSearch - user inputted date used to get the building hours end time for selected date
        Returns:
        String the start time of the building on this date

      • getBuildingEndTime

        public java.lang.String getBuildingEndTime(int buildingID,
                                           java.lang.String dateToSearch)
        Gets the ending time for the building on the date and building id sent
        Parameters:
        buildingID, - date to check
        dateToSearch - user inputted date used to get the building hours end time for selected date
        Returns:
        String the end time of the building on this date
